title.rendered: Sharjah vs Desert, International T20 Series, 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Sharjah: Rahmanullah Gurbaz (wk), Tom Kohler-Cadmore, Marcus Stoinis, Joe Denly (c), Adam Hose, Mohammad Nabi, Paul Walter, Naveen-ul-Haq, Noor Ahmad, Junaid Siddique, Muhammad Jawadullah

Desert: Rohan Mustafa, Alex Hales, Colin Munro (c), Sam Billings (wk), Sherfane Rutherford, Benny Howell, Mark Watt, Tom Curran, Luke Wood, Shiraz Ahmed, Matheesha Pathirana

Venue: Sharjah Cricket Stadium, Sharjah

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 190

2nd innings average score: 112

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Chasing hasn’t been easy

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

When these teams met earlier in the competition, Alex Hales (83 off 52) and Sam Billings (49 off 38) were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

Mohammad Nabi has taken 25 wickets at Sharjah, including the best figures of 4 for 12. He has also collected 523 runs at 24.

Rahmanullah Gurbaz averages 28 at the venue including the highest score of 84. Given his impact at the top, his selection percentage hasn’t dropped below 90 for the last 4 games.

It hasn’t been a productive season for Rohan Mustafa. With the bat, he averages 9. With the ball, he has managed only 3 wickets in 7 games.

Despite the smaller ground dimensions, only 27 sixes have been hit in the last 3 games. Shockingly, not a single maximum has been launched while chasing in the last 2 games.

In the same period, 5 half-centuries have been registered, out of which 4 have come while batting first.

All the 3 three-fors have gone the way of the seamers. The best figures by a spinner read 2 for 18.
